title: SCP-3999

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While blackmailed, your target may exclusively whisper to you and you may exclusively whisper to your target. Neither of you may speak in any other channels, but you may speak in your factional chat.
- Your ability does not end until you die or your target dies.
- At night, your target may choose to Fight you. This has a 50% chance of succeeding. Upon succeeding it has a 50% chance of killing you and a 50% chance of killing your target. A failed attempt will cause nothing to happen.

desc:
Post 4383
*Let us go then, you and I
When the Eleven-Day Empire eats the sky
Like a humanoid melting like clams upon the breakfast table.*
